# paint 

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

An artisanally crafted set of print methods for `data.frame` family rectangles.

## Installation

```r
remotes::install_github("milesmcbain/paint")
```

## Example

```{r eval = TRUE}
library(paint)
mtcars
```
